subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: If Michigan State doesn’t make it to the Final Four this year, its seniors will be the first group to miss out. The Spartans held off Southern California on Sunday to take them one step closer.
snippet: If Michigan State doesn’t make it to the Final Four this year, its seniors will be the first group to miss out. The Spartans held off Southern California on Sunday to take them one step closer.
